item.title: Engineering a good course
item.author: Iacopo Russo,
item.description: When I found out that my team had made it to the finals of the Engineers Without Borders (EWB) Challenge I was of course really pleased to know that all of our effort was actually worth it. I feel really satisfied because I think that if they chose us out of the 50 teams in the UK and Ireland, this â€¦
